name: SOPHIA HUYNH
slogan: The all-rounder you never knew you needed.
blurb: I work with my clients to create meaningful digital experiences through customer research, insights, and collaborative design.
midheadline: G'day! My name is Sophia Huynh. I'm a freelancer with a very particular set of skills. Skills that can help you elevate your customer experience design...

aboutme.textcontent: G'day. My name is Sophia, and I am the all-rounder you never knew you needed. I have a unique skillset, covering customer, business, and technology. I have experience working with enterprise and nonprofit clients - leading qualitative research, mapping processes and synthesising insights - in order to transform their service or product experiences. I come from a technical background as a Software Engineer, and have worked in corporate Digital Strategy & Transformation consulting.

I focus on intersection of qualitative research and process/service design, providing clients with actionable insights. Iâ€™m a highly driven and dedicated problem solver. I'm a flexible, adaptable who learns quickly. I understand the value of empathy, listening, communication, trust - especially in team settings and in stakeholder management.

funfaq.textcontent: The background of this website is a photo I took in Melbourne.
I really enjoy photography. If you want to see really angsty photography...
